articles.description: Popular video game streamer Dr Disrespect, who was banned from the Twitch platform recently, has finally responded via Twitter
articles.content:
Champions Club,Twitch has not notified me on the specific reason behind their decision... Firm handshakes to all https://t.co/HuTOqsyBzG
— Dr Disrespect (@drdisrespect) 1593309817000

articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.title: Sony announces $50,000 reward for finding a critical bug in PS4 - The Indian Express
articles.description: The announcement came after Sony partnered with security platform HackerOne, a vulnerability coordination and bug bounty platform that connects businesses with penetration testers and cybersecurity researchers.
articles.content:
By: Tech Desk | 
Updated: June 29, 2020 10:33:11 am
Sony has partnered with HackerOne to help run this bug bounty programme (Bloomberg File)Big price is up for grabs for ethical hackers as Sony has… [+2301 chars]

articles.title: Twitter apologises for wrongfully labelling tweets with words oxygen, frequency - India Today
articles.description: Twitter slapped a misinformation label on some tweets having words oxygen and frequency even if they were factually correct tweets.
articles.content: When it comes to labelling or calling out tweets that mislead, misinform, or glorify violence, Twitter does not take long to take action. It recently updated its policies to curb misinformation in th… [+3089 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft confirms it is closing all its physical retail stores globally - GamesRadar
articles.description: Four of its premium locations will be reconfigured as "experience centres"
articles.content:
Microsoft has confirmed it is closing all of its Microsoft Store locations across the world.
An anonymous source told The Verge

articles.author: IANS
articles.title: Find a critical bug in Sony PS4 and earn Rs 38 lakh - Times Now
articles.description: The bug bounty programme has rewards for various issues, including critical issues on PS4. Critical vulnerabilities for PS4 have bounties starting at $50,000 while for PlayStation Network is $3,000.
articles.content: Sony has announced its own bug bounty programme for PlayStation 4 (PS4) and the PlayStation Network, and the top price up for grabs for ethical hackers who find critical vulnerabilities in PS4 is $50… [+1540 chars]
